FY2019 GLOBAL CITIZENSHIP ANNUAL REPORT
ENVIRONMENTAL SUSTAINABILITY048 
Our Scope 2 location based emissions 
(GHG emissions generated from the 
electricity that we purchase) increased 
by 0.2 percent, from 887,964 metric 
tons of CO2e in CY2017 to 890,010 in 
CY2018. Our Scope 2 market based 
emissions in CY2018 equaled 902,266 
metric tons of CO2e. Seagate’s primary 
approach to reduction of Scope 2 
emissions is energy conservation. We used the WRI/WBCSD Greenhouse Gas 
Protocol (Scope 1 and 2) for Scopes 
1 and 2 calculations, and the WRI/
WBCSD Greenhouse Gas Protocol 
Corporate Value Chain (Scope 3) for our 
Scope 3 calculations. Our GWP factors 
are based on IPCC Fifth Assessment 
Report (AR5 – 100 year), and we 
scope our reporting for which we have 
operational control.
